channel.title: I did something wrong?

item.title: I did something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @peoplereaper2 peoplereaper2
item.description:
@peoplereaper2 wrote:

while coding you messed up one or two things and it screwed up your whole code my suggestion is redownload the server take the new client file take that same spot that u messed up and replace it

item.title: I did something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

i tried doing this new quest thing from this tut on rune-server.org

http://www.rune-server.org/f10/new-quest-system-updated-sample-quest-t82910.html

and i got this

client.java:36022: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:36062: illegal start of expression public boolean savechar() { ^ client.java:36062: ';' expected public boolean savechar() { ^ client.java:36260: illegal start of expression public boolean savecharbackupmyth(Player plr) { ^ client.java:36260: ';' expected public boolean savecharbackupmyth(Player plr) { ^ client.java:36260: ';' expected public boolean savecharbackupmyth(Player plr) { ^ client.java:36276: illegal start of expression public boolean savecharbackup() { ^ client.java:36276: ';' expected public boolean savecharbackup() { ^ client.java:36473: illegal start of expression public int loadcharbackup() { ^ client.java:36473: ';' expected public int loadcharbackup() { ^ client.java:36662: illegal start of expression public int getPass(String playerName2) { ^ client.java:36662: ';' expected public int getPass(String playerName2) { ^ client.java:36662: ';' expected public int getPass(String playerName2) { ^ client.java:36764: illegal start of expression public int autoers() { ^ client.java:36764: ';' expected public int autoers() { ^ client.java:36780: illegal start of expression public int checkMacroWarn() { ^ client.java:36780: ';' expected public int checkMacroWarn() { ^ client.java:36798: illegal start of expression public int checkstarter() { ^ client.java:36798: ';' expected public int checkstarter() { ^ client.java:36817: illegal start of expression public int checkbannedusers() { ^ client.java:36817: ';' expected public int checkbannedusers() { ^ client.java:36835: illegal start of expression public int checkbannedips() { ^ client.java:36835: ';' expected public int checkbannedips() { ^ client.java:36853: illegal start of expression public int checkmembers() { ^ client.java:36853: ';' expected public int checkmembers() { ^ client.java:36871: illegal start of expression public int checkmods() { ^ client.java:36871: ';' expected public int checkmods() { ^ client.java:36889: illegal start of expression public int checkadmins() { ^ client.java:36889: ';' expected public int checkadmins() { ^ client.java:36907: illegal start of expression public int checkstaff() { ^ client.java:36907: ';' expected public int checkstaff() { ^ server.java:234: class, interface, or enum expected public static questHandler qHandler = new questHandler(); ^ server.java:235: class, interface, or enum expected public static int totalQP = qHandler.checkTotQP(); ^ server.java:237: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 34 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

im trying to find out what i did wrongâ€¦ but i dont know yet any help?
